resources.string: Enter in minutes, the interval you want to send your location data.
Username and Password for the Tracker app

Welcome to Tracker!!! 


Before we can start we need to make sure of few things. 

First of all please make sure you have a Tracker Username and Password.

Now lets set the SMS setting. 


When there is no internet available Tracker can send your location via SMS. This may apply standard SMS rates. Please check if want to enable sending your location via SMS. 

You can change this setting later by going to your Settings Menu.

Finally 


Let's set the interval setting. Please enter the interval you want to send your location in minutes. 

This can also be changed later from the Settings menu.
Tracker encountered some error while checking in via SMS
Please make sure you have internet connection or enable SMS in the Settings menu
Please Enter Something in the Interval
You do not have a internet connection, You need internet connection to Login
Please provoide a valid username and password
Please make sure that your internet connection is working properly.
Your GPS seems to be disabled, Please enable it to start tracking
Please Stop tracking before you log out
